title: Windows 10 *Instalation Error Directx* please help !!!
body:
I just installed Windows 10 and i have this problem with Lol:
When the instalation starts it freezes for about 40seconds trying to install Directx and then this error occurs
"There has been an error.
Error running C:\Riot Games\ League of legends\ Prerequisites\Dx9\dxsetup.exe \silent: child killed:Unknown Signal
The application will now exit."
-I tried installing direct x 9 and 10 but nothing happened
-The drivers are all installed ( to my knowledge )

Please help i need to solve this it's driving me crazy !! Plus that 'silent child killed" part is kinda creepy don't ya think ?! :P

replies.body:
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I can help you with that.
You must replace your os operation System that is one that can help or the second, open in our computer 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} /my computer/windows/sys WOW64.
{{sticker:darius-angry}}  And delete next files 
D3DCompiler_43
D3DX9_43
d3dx9_39
D3DX11_43
xinput1_3
and then try to install lol){{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
﻿
dude i love you you save my fucking life! :D
ola sou do brasil também estou com o mesmo problema isso que o cara ensinou nao adianta
bom eu fiz isso nao adiantou de nada
Thanks you very much my americano friend <3

Try double checking that you're running that directx installer as admin first! Right click on it and pick run as administrator and that should help. If not, try hitting up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help walk you through some steps.
I was running it as adminstrator , it was like this by defaut , i sent a "ticket" to Riot Games Support  and am awaiting for assistance . Thank you verry much!

I am having the same issue. I have updated all my drives, windows, directx, etc.. deleted CFG files like others suggested and many other things. I opened a ticket and havent heard back in over a week. I still cannot play. 
What is the appropriate time to give up?

They replied to me see here :
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/32469396
I am still waiting for the tech guy/gal to reply and tell me what the issiue is. But the nice thing is that they did reply so i have hope :P
ola boa tarde, estou precisando de ajuda se nao vou acabar desistido do lol que é um jogo que eu amo muito estou com o mesmo problema alguem pode me ajudar ?

Same shit here happend after my hdd died and i had to intstall new w10
Does others game that requiers dx9 work to you guys or ?
Danm! I have the same problem!
Same problem did you fix it yet ?
no still working with League Support . These are the mesages so far https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/32469396  check it out
Did u fix ur problem or not yet?
